entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • bool does not implement IParsable<TSelf> #78523
  • Failing to build FreeBSD - `src/native/libs/System.Native/pal_networkstatistics.c` #78522
  • Misc work item tracking for .NET 8.0 #78518
    8.0.0
  • Unable to break execution. The debugger is unable to stop this process as no CLR has been loaded for self contained and publish ready to run WPF app #78507
  • non-ASCII being rejected #78514
  • Unification of CoreCLR and Mono - AOT / NativeAOT #78504
  • Analyzer for STAThread attribute applied to async Main #78502
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #78517
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #78512
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #78515
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0046\\istype\\istype.cmd #78500
  • [mono] Unify behavior of BulkMoveWithWriteBarrier with CoreCLR #78498
    8.0.0
  • `HttpRequestException`: Destination is too short. (Parameter 'destination') #78516
  • Consolidate UTF8 character encoding implementations #78490
  • Possible threading issues with non thread safe collections in Options classes #78489

Closed

  • NativeAot doesn't warn for base/override annotation mismatch on generic virtual methods #77744
  • Hidden version files in .NET runtime installation #77061
  • Move ILLink documentation to runtime docs folder #78052
    8.0.0
  • Receive Error while trying to use: System.Management throw System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.Management currently is only supported for Windows desktop applications.' #78464
    Future
  • XmlSerializer serializes objects without removing whitespace between XML tags. #78511
  • Mono does not support querying for and open generic type when searching for Attributes #56887
    8.0.0
  • Blazor: Generic attributes do not work in Mono #77047
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] Assertion failed 'tree == stmt->GetRootNode()' during 'Optimize layout' #78322
    8.0.0
  • Build dotnet6 for Rocky Linux 8.6 is failed #78496
  • Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject throws a TypeLoadException if the parameter has a covariant property. #78090
  • Too wide memory load causes System.AccessViolationException on x64 and ARM64 platforms #78272
    8.0.0
  • Unsafe.ReadUnaligned causes System.AccessViolationException on Windows ARM64 #76194
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GC_VersionInfo2 #70276
    Future
  • GenerateClaimsAsync method in UserClaimsPrincipalFactory getting called after every 30 minutes in Blazor Server #78499
  • readytorun\r2rdump\R2RDumpTest is not designed for running outside of coreclr in-place-build #11823
    Future
  • [wasm][aot] Uncaught errors in `System.Runtime.Tests` #74302
    7.0.x
  • Changed behaviour for PropertyInfo comparison between .net6 and .net7 #78487
  • [API Proposal]: Random.NextTimeSpan #78488

PullRequests

Created

  • Add System.Diagnostics.Process README.md #78525
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] VN implicit cast fix for normalize-on-load #78524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix to move to using GC pal within coreclr on Linux #78521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Change the default SuperPMI collection location #78513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarify docs for Leading/TrailingZeroCount #78510
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove unused argument from IL test entrypoints #78501
    test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Improve controlling which scenarios test libraries should be run against #78495
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Enable all of the jiterpreter's JITs by default #78493
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix memory leaks reported by static analyzer #78492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move illink documentation to runtime's documentation location #78520
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use forattributename jsgenerator #78136
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix the TimeSpan comment about internal representation. #78364
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix fgOptimizeSwitchJumps #78494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some Windows specific formatters #78434
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove unused arguments from C# test Mains #78478
    test-enhancement
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Removing outdated unused r2rdump tests #78431
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter cleanup #78482
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove some unnecessary templating in assembly binder #78441
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • CreateSegment events #78430
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add check for interval->writeThru in the assert #78418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code quality concerns #78485
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix usage of implicit pointer types in a few more places… #76878
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Put GenericTypeDefinition into genericCache to try to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Use a list for tests in src/tests/run.py #78463
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SIMDify ToLowerInvariant/ToUpperInvariant #78262
  • Initial JIT test merging #78259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use helpers in Guid's ROS<byte> constructor #78446
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator.AsNativeType to return ManagedTypeInfo instead of TypeSyntax #78195
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Implement abstraction for marshalling direction in the generator APIs #78196
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Implement `GT_LCLHEAP` codegen #2093
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge up to feature/NativeAOT-final tag #2092

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initialize locals in codegen #2091

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ASP.NET] Reenable StaticWebAssets_HostedApp_ReferencingNetStandardLibrary_Works #29111
  • Valid dotnet commands with a capital letter doesn't do anything #29109
  • NoStdLib is not beign respected after net7 upgrade #29110

Closed

  • NuGet.config permission issue on Linux for dotnet nuget commands #29098
  • MSBuildWorkspace.Create() fails when pointing to the .NET 7 SDK from a .NET 6 project #29108
  • dotnet test ignores platform argument in 7.0 #29104

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in ZipFileCreateFromDirectory.cs #29097
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #29095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29094
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add missing dependencies #29101
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. (#28380) #29052
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External, Servicing-consider
  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines #29093
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2047605 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix unhandled exception during test discovery on macOS #29083
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When we remove solution crawler, we can remove remote global notification service. #65491
  • Implement interface members code fix doesn't add <inheritdoc/> over generated members #65486
  • IDE0058 removes `using` from variable declaration #65485
  • Optimize perf for FixAll code path in CompilationWithAnalyzers #65484
    17.5
  • Initializer member complete too aggressive at first #65482
  • Enhance newline formatting option for placement of ? and : in multiline conditional expression #65479
  • Fix-All for analyzers marked as syntax-only still computes semantics. #65477
    17.5

Closed

  • `SetsRequiredMembersAttribute` accepting list of members #65358
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33117.159 #65494
  • Update pattern matching analyzer to additional case #65308
    17.5
  • "args" variable does not show up in intellisense for top level statements (console template) #55969
    17.5
  • [Compatibility issue] VB compiler generates tons of BC36954 errors when I upgrade .NET 6 projects to .NET 7 #65392
    17.5
  • Enable incremental member edit analysis by default #63324
    17.5 P1
  • Question: Roslyn version in Visual Studio 17.4? #65455

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not import the VSWorkspace during Roslyn package initialization #65492
    Area-IDE
  • Update PublicKeywordRecommenderTests.cs #65490
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add A/B test to allow us to turn off background compilation/parsing #65489
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce tagging work in files without raw strings #65488
    Area-IDE
  • [PERF] Do not force Compilation.GetDiagnostics for FixAll of syntax-only analyzers #65483
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance
  • Trampoline to a base method implementation when deleting an override #65481
    Area-Compilers
  • Move context-sensitive parsing to context-free parsing. #65480
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experimental formatting option to control placement of `=>` #65476
    Area-IDE
  • Results of running the arrow-placement analyzer on roslyn #65475
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add experimental formatting option to control places of `?` and `:` in a conditional expression. #65467
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65459
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Enhances the set of cases 'use pattern matching' works for. #65314
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support new all-in-one-symbol-search APIs. #65449
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure the causing syntax node is always in the timing dictionary #65321
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Warn for multiple blank lines in source #65451
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unused MismatchedParameterDefaultValue enum value #65472
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow usage of ref structs in VB despite CompilerFeatureRequired #65431
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use [Fact] not [WpfFact] #65473
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable member edit analysis when LSP pull diagnostics is on #65468
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Run the conditional-token-placement fixer on roslyn #65469
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for unused parameters in source #65466
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert parser warning into a binding warning. #65440
    Area-Compilers
  • Create new vsix for arm64 and x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block #65452
    Area-IDE
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65453
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix a NullReferenceException in Signature help #65372
    Area-IDE
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - try catch snippet #65101
    Area-IDE
  • 🧹 Declare MEF dependencies of VisualStudioWorkspace #54377
    Area-IDE
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check type parameter index bounds when parsing `DocumentationCommentId` #65457
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable Option to Use Content Negotiation for ProblemDetails #45159
  • ASPNETCORE_CONTENTROOT being ignored in .NET 7 #45155
  • http body writeasync size limit #45154
  • Unclear how you should respond to Parameter changing after #26230 #45152
    Discussions
  • Upgrading nuget package "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation" from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 causes unwanted errors to be shown in api logging. #45149
  • Add a mechanism to override how Blazor's JS dynamic imports are performed #45148
    Backlog
  • GenerateClaimsAsync method in UserClaimsPrincipalFactory getting called after every 30 minutes in Blazor Server #45147
  • Web Finger (RFC7033) middleware #45143
    Discussions
  • Enable JSON format output for `user-jwts list` #45141
    8.0

Closed

  • Publish v6 packages in a way that works with the reality of NuGet today, rather than working against it #38336
  • Blazor Webassembly Project Template no longer works #44880
    Discussions
  • WithSummary and WithDescription deson't work in minimal api #45082
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server WebSocket failed to connect behind Nginx/Ingress #45153
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM authentication back button history behavior still problematic with 3rd party IDP #45097
    Backlog
  • Lazy loaded `BlazorCustomElements.js` file does not adhere to the `loadBootResource` configuration #45104
    Backlog
  • Lack of useful debug information #44769
  • The thrown exception's message is completely useless... #44895
  • Kestrel: Connection id "XXX" application never completed. #44870
  • Blazor WebAssembly project cannot read appsettings.json file when connected with http instead of https #44900
  • Invalid SignalR version with blazor server #44961
  • ExceptionHandlerMiddleware should be able to include HTTP Headers from original requests #45137
  • UseHttpsRedirection: A post request on http redirects to get #44967

PullRequests

Created

  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-runtime
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Add route string syntax to more APIs #45146
    area-runtime
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: Throw AddressInUseException for used port in the same process #45144
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove array allocation from multi-span header parsing #45044
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • fix DefaultPolicy unreasonable behavior. #45122
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2047598 #44686
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide more feedback on profiler attach failure reasons #3512

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce SemanticProperties.IsCheckable #11461
  • FlyoutItems duplicated on setting FlyoutItemIsVisible #11460
  • Enable Scope Validation for dependency injection in .NET MAUI during development #11457
    Backlog
  • XAML: IsVisible #11454
  • VerticalStackLayout does not trigger parent Grid resize properly when children are added #11453
    Backlog
  • ListView: Label - LineBreakMode Middle Truncation #11451
    Backlog
  • Shell.TitleView sometimes disappears when returning to the MainPage on Android. #11443
    Backlog
  • IME platform specific on Android is overwritten by ReturnType #11442
    Backlog
  • CollectionView inside RefreshView causes layout problems on iOS #11440
    Backlog
  • MAUI needs a good (selfhosted) serverless partner. #11435
    Backlog
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer NumberOfTapsRequired is not working #11434
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Navigating to a sub page of another tab does not execute on first call #11433
    Backlog
  • iOS | Navigating to a modal page under a different tab broken #11430
    Backlog
  • Entry - Different font for placeholder when password mode is enabled #11428
  • Button with shadow style does not appear if it is "IsVisible = false" initially #11427
    Backlog
  • Vertical centered Icons in App Shell TabBar when title is not set #11426
    Backlog
  • Ability to change baseurl #11425
  • FlexLayout doesn't show controls. #11424
    Backlog

Closed

  • Opening a second window results in fatal errors #11452
    Backlog
  • How to measure the FPS ? #8876
  • When a custom NavigationDelegate is set in iOS, Navigated is not called #11074
    Backlog
  • Wrong button sizing when using CharacterSpacing - MAC #11265
  • Entry field Enter does not always move to next field #5724
    Backlog
  • Navigation.TitleView/Title doesn't work #10965
    Backlog
  • Entry crashing on iOS #11298
  • WPF & Winforms with Blazor app leak 2 file system handles every time app.css is saved #11064
    8.0-preview1
  • iOS The type initializer for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape' threw an exception. on latest .NET 7 #11333
  • [Bug] [Android] RefreshView not resizing #3248
    Backlog
  • ScrollView is not scrollable inside of RefreshView #5772
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Issues AMM0000 error in the AndroidManifest #11172
  • .NET Maui, Xcode 13.2.1 Mac OS 11.7.1 iOS Project Build Link Options ( Link framework SDK only ) not being recognised. #11444
  • Not Rules for Android JAR SDK #9672
  • OpenAppPackageFileAsync Stream does copy correctly to iphone #11132
  • .Net Maui iOS 15.4 app won't build using Asp.net 6.0.400, Visual Studio 17.3.6 & Xamarin SDK 17.3.0.308 #11156
  • Android emulator unable to call local web api via 10.0.2.2 via http or https - stuck after hours of trying #10086
  • InputFile not working on Blazor Desktp in winform #11093
  • Adaptive Trigger not working NET 7 MacCatalyst #11114
  • more than one collectionview doesn't work in visual studio for mac #11164
  • Error MAUI0000 - System.Xml.XmlException #11167

PullRequests

Created

  • Stable NET7 SR1 Version #11459
  • [net7.0] Update Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools #11456
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] restore unittests for native views binding #11449
  • [net7.0] If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #11447
    area/controls 🎮
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #11438
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • [Housekeeping] Remove calls to Console.WriteLine to decrease app size #11437
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Update Essentials DeviceInfo API Docs #11431
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials DeviceDisplay API Docs #11429
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • [net7.0] Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.5 to 1.2.221109.1 #11450
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix tablet mode detection #11448
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Update net6 version for building from net7 #11458
  • Don't set editor action to handled #11386
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Consolidate handlertestbase #11445
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Stable .NET 6 SR8 Version #11455
  • Remove unnecessary MeasureOverride from RefreshView; #11357
    area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11370
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11373
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11378
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11175
    area/layout 🔲, layout-scrollview

    area/setup 🪄
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948

  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580 #11352
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11394
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11395
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11415
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11417
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials AppInfo API Docs #11374
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11389
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11390

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Discriminator is always filled with a default value when it is (or part of) the primary key AND a shadow field #29605
  • Conditional dependent entity? #29604
  • Comparing a property with a value converter against null throws exception in EF7 InMemory #29603
  • Compiled models with JSON columns #29602
  • HasPrecision overrides precision set in explicit store type #29600
  • Count() is not working correctly with Include() and HasQueryFilter() #29599
  • DbSet Moq Exception #29598
  • Think about DbContext configuration patterns and OnConfiguring #29597
  • Memory increase when creating so many Sqlite databases #29596
  • Upgraded VS2022 to latest supporting .Net 7 - Now dotnet ef migrations bundle throws exception. #29594
  • EF Core 7 GroupBy with Owned Entity perf Regression #29593

Closed

  • How to ensure there is only one key pair in a many-to-many relation? #29524
  • efcore 7 - json mapping to non-efcore updated column #29591
  • Decimal Parameters in query default to Precision=18, Scale=2 #29313
  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - DataAnnotation 'TypeName' and fluent API 'HasColumnType' is not being honored for aggregate type for which ToJson() is defined #29587
  • Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #29572
    8.0.0
  • EFCore fails to filter when projecting to a C# record type #27281
  • Error when mapping a common abstracted relationship table to more than one case #29498
  • Consider revisiting EF.CompileQuery API #14551
  • Incorrect Entries Values in DbUpdateException when an error occurs in the SQL MERGE statement during insert #29379
    8.0.0
  • Migration doesn't detect alterations to existing properties EF core 7 #29595
  • Configuring a context with a DbDataSource builder can defeat connection pooling #29489
  • SqlServer fail to execute datetime where inline #29548

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix value generation with converter between different numeric types #29601

Merged

  • Make DbUpdateException.Entries contain all entries when we can't populate it #29571
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server result mapping for bulk insert (#29565) #29590
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • Translate x.parse #28337
  • Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #29417

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build dotnet6 for Rocky Linux 8.6 is failed #15010

PullRequests

Merged

Updated

    Area-SourceBuild
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Eliminate runtime portable build #14816
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #15006
